subject: This Week on Reliable Sources
body:
CNN.com










Coming up this Sunday on Reliable Sources:

Same Story, Different Day?

Some very
serious journalists are releasing two new somewhat critical
books on Hillary Clinton.  Is this big news, or are the media
just singing the same old song about the Presidential
candidate?  

ABC's Iran Report

ABC
came under criticism from some politicians and public after the
network lead World News Tonight this week with a story about
covert U.S. activities in Iran.  Was the news division
jeopardizing national security, or just doing their jobs?

War-Funding Coverage

Many in the media said
there were not enough congressional votes to pass a bill
requiring benchmarks for withdrawal from Iraq.	When the
Democrats backed down from the benchmarks this week, were
reporters eager to issue a big I-told-you-so?


Plus, Robin Roberts: the morning show host talks
candidly about her life, religion and making choices that
effect her career as a journalist.  

Join us this
Sunday and every Sunday at 10am ET / 7am PT for our critical
look at the media!
